# formattr

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of **`formattr`** is to provide simple tools for formatting and printing numeric values nicely (e.g. in generated reports or tables).

## Installation

You can install the current development version of `formattr` from [GitHub](https://github.com) with:

``` r
#install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("rosswilson-nz/formattr")
```

This section will contain examples of usage.
